content:
# I successfully crafted 1 stone furnace, and my inventory now contains the furnace along with 10 units of coal, 5 units of stone, and 10 units of iron ore.
# Next, I will place the stone furnace on the ground so that I can start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# Let's place the stone furnace at my current position.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=current_position())  # Place the stone furnace at the current position.
print(f"Entities after placing furnace: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities to confirm the furnace placement.
